thread.title: BRIEF-Google says to restrict ads for cryptocurrencies and related content

title: BRIEF-Google says to restrict ads for cryptocurrencies and related content
text: March 14, 2018 / 4:33 AM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Google says to restrict ads for cryptocurrencies and related content Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 14 (Reuters) - * GOOGLE SAYS IN JUNE 2018 TO UPDATE FINANCIAL SERVICES POLICY TO RESTRICT ADS OF CONTRACTS FOR DIFFERENCE, ROLLING SPOT FOREX,FINANCIAL SPREAD BETTING * GOOGLE SAYS ADS FOR BINARY OPTIONS AND SYNONYMOUS PRODUCTS, CRYPTOCURRENCIES AND RELATED CONTENT WILL NO LONGER BE ALLOWED TO SERVE * GOOGLE SAYS ADVERTISERS OFFERING CONTRACTS FOR DIFFERENCE, ROLLING SPOT FOREX, AND FINANCIAL SPREAD BETTING WILL BE REQUIRED TO BE CERTIFIED BY CO Source text - bit.ly/2Inxgg8 Further company coverage:
